trends: There has been one other sighting in Desert Center
There were no other sightings in Desert Center on or around April 23rd 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsIn my aircraft, flying from Blythe to Twenty-nine Palms, 7:30am, 8,500 feet, sunbehind us we spotted a white spherical object moving just above the desert flooras a baloon in wind-erratic, up and down about 100 - 200 feet. Object then movedon a straight course right to left in front of our flight path (no furthererratic moves). A second object came into view, same path. Both stopped, thentraveled straight up at very fast rate of climb, then disappeared. No visiblewings or other familiar, typical shapes, or exhaust, thrust (visual from heat)distortion. Ascent rate seemed unreal.
